Text:
Thanks for uploading and to those seeding.
Player used to watch the movie - KMPlayer
okay print, no audio errors, good volume, multiple instances of minor pixelation throughout the movie, the ones i noticed 00:23:56, 00:54:50, 1:43:56, 1:51:01, 1:54:35, 2:05:14....
Runtime - 2:27:01, Resolution - 720x388, FPS - 23, Audio Bitrate - 320kbps, Video Data Rate - 177kbps.
could not find properly synced subtitles on the net.
Mike
